verbs.description: [ARG1: person] [ARGM-MNR: fatally] [V: struck] [ARG2: by blue line train] [ARGM-LOC: at addison station] officers responded about 9 a m to a call of a person struck by a train near the station at 3622 w addison st according to chicago police northwest side addison station chicago police department cook county medical examiners office irving park blue line train train blue line
